string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
Someone I know needs help. He is a scumbag but he deserves assistance. Report to him and see what he wants.
Good luck stalker.
Raid Enemy Camp for Duty
Lead a Duty raid against an enemy camp.
We're preparing a raid on an enemy camp. I need you to lead the assault.
Excellent work. You are a fine warrior.
Locate Brain Scorcher Equipment
A stalker has removed a part of the Brain Scorcher and stashed it somewhere in the Zone. Find it and return it to General Petrenko

I have information that a stalker has managed to steal a piece of equipment from the Brain Scorcher and stashed it somewhere. We must recover it, it could be a powerful weapon and must not fall into the wrong hands. There are a few places it could be hidden. I have half the base out looking for it right now. I want you to check one of the possible locations. If you find it, bring it here immediately.
You have done well. Thank you.
Petrenko's Most Wanted
A certain faction member has risen to the top of General Petrenko's most wanted list and he wants him executed.
There is a member of a certain faction who has caused me more trouble than anyone else in the Zone. So far none of my men have been able to get to him. If you can kill him, I will reward you well.
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Good job. Here is your payment.
Search Lab X-19
General Petrenko will pay handsomely for any documents found inside Lab X-19 in Radar.

My sources tell me you plan on infiltrating the Brain Scorcher in Radar. I think you are out of your mind but if you are really going to go through with it I have an offer for you. Bring back any documentation you find in there. I will reward you well.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
A friend of mine could use your help. Go see him.
Good luck stalker.
Find Replacement %s for Mangun
Mangun screwed up a repair and needs a replacement %s for his client.
I need some help, bro. A Dutier brought me in his rifle for repairs but I messed it up pretty bad. I need to find a replacement for him before he comes to pick it up.
If you come across a %s, bring it to me. I don't have much money but I have something I can trade you for it.
Hey, great! You found one. Thanks bro, you saved my ass.
Clear Out Mutants for Mangun
Mangun needs the road out of the Bar cleared of mutants.

Hey bro, can you do something for me? I gotta go somewhere but I heard there are mutants on the road leading out of the Bar. I'm no good at shooting, may aim is all shaky for some reason. Could you clear them out for me? I have a rifle that a customer never picked up that I can give you.
Thanks bro. Here's the rifle I promised you. Hope you have better luck than its previous owner... poor guy. Good thing he paid me in advance, hehe.
Duty Initiation Fee
General Petrenko will let you join Duty for a fee of 12,000 RU.
We would be more than happy to have you join Duty. There is an initiation fee, of course. If you can bring me 12,000 RU I'll get you in.
Welcome to Duty, stalker. Do us proud.
Временный договор с военными
Имеется сертификат на 5 дней нейтралитета.

К военным наведаться решил? Если имеешь в наличии 25000 RU - могу оформить хоть сейчас. Скину цифровой сертификат на КПК, разошлю данные о тебе по своим каналам. Разрешение будет действовать 5 дней, продлевать нельзя. Понадобится ещё - подходи только по истечении предыдущего срока.
Срок действия истёк.
Временный договор с наёмниками
Имеется 7 дней нейтралитета.
С тебя 50000 RU, прямо на месте всё сделаю.
Срок действия истёк.
Поиск провизии
Принести Бармену %s.
У меня возникли некоторые проблемы с поставкой свежего мяса. Интересно?

Недавняя вылазка «Долга» для охоты на мутантов оказалась очень неудачной. К счастью, никто не погиб, но мяса я так и не увидел, а людей кормить чем-то надо. Так что, если есть желание подзаработать, доставь мне %s. И я буду благодарен, и «долговцам» про твою услугу расскажу.
Молодец, сталкер!
Найти КПК
Принести Бармену КПК.
Мне нужно, чтобы ты забрал для меня КПК из одного тайника.
Отлично! Вот твоя награда.
Defend Rostok
Hostile forces are encroaching on Duty base in Rostok. General Petrenko has asked you to eliminate the threat.
I have been informed that enemy forces are advancing on our location. I need you to stop them before they get here.
Excellent work. You are a fine warrior.
Reclaim Duty Territory
You have been tasked to recapture territory for Duty. Report back to General Petrenko after the job is done.
I have an important mission available. Freedom has taken over one of our camps and I need a specialist to reclaim it.
The task is done? Good job.
Assassinate VIP for Petrenko
General Petrenko has ordered you to find and eliminate a target.

I have a list of VIPs that need...taken care of. Some are informants, high-ranking Freedom members, squad leaders, tacticians or just plain scum. Extract information if you can, otherwise kill-on-sight.
Great! You do us proud. Here is what I promised.
Уничтожить логово мутантов
Полковник Петренко приказал зачистить местность.

Неподалёку отсюда мутанты устроили новое логово. Через те места постоянно ходят сталкеры - нельзя позволить, чтобы какая-нибудь псевдособака загрызла очередного новичка. Твоей задачей будет зачистить местность и обезопасить дорогу в Бар.
Молодец! Держи свою награду.
Спасти сталкера
Поступил приказ вернуть пропавшего сталкера.

На днях пропал местный сталкер. Мужики говорят, что просто пошёл на охоту и не вернулся. Я не могу организовать полноценную операцию по спасению ради одного человека, но и так просто это дело нельзя оставлять.
Ну ты герой, хвалю! Держи, с меня причитается.
Find %s for Mangun
%s are required by Mangun to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I can really use a good set of tools, stalker...and maybe some money. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I am looking for.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Cool dude...uh, sorry I can't pay you. I'll give you a good discount though, man!
Find %s for Mangun
%s are required by Mangun to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Hey, dude, if you happen to find some more advanced tools I will give you a discount. Will you keep a lookout for me?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great...GREAT! Now maybe I can make some damn money. I'm gonna be BIG time, stalker...if I can just get my act together. I don't have much to offer you other then a discount. Sorry, bud.
Find %s for Mangun
%s are required by Mangun to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Hey, dude, if you happen to find some more advanced tools I will give you a discount. Will you keep a lookout for me?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great...GREAT! Now maybe I can make some damn money. I'm gonna be BIG time, stalker...if I can just get my act together. I don't have much to offer you other then a discount. Sorry, bud.
